introduction_japanese: 賢いは、学校や日常で人や動物の頭の良さや、子どもの行いが良いときの話でよく使う形容詞です。選択や判断が上手な場面でも使います。
introduction_english: The adjective かしこい is commonly used when talking about someone's or an animal's cleverness, when a child behaves well, and when describing good choices or judgments.
meaning_explanation_japanese: 「賢い」は、頭が良くて考え方が上手なことや、子どもや動物がおりこうで言うことをよく聞くことを表します。場面によっては『いい判断をする』という意味でも使います。
meaning_explanation_english: The word かしこい means being smart or clever, and it can also describe children or pets who are well-behaved and obedient. It is also used when someone makes a good, sensible choice.

common_words: 賢明 (けんめい): sensible, wise; having good judgment
賢者 (けんじゃ): a wise person, sage

kanji_explanation: The first kanji means cleverness and wisdom. In the word けんめい it gives the sense of being sensible and making good decisions. In the word けんじゃ it shows a person who has deep wisdom.
synonyms: 利口 : りこう : clever, smart
賢明 : けんめい : wise, prudent
synonym_explanation: The most common synonyms of the かしこい are りこう and けんめい. りこう is close to practical cleverness or being quick-witted, while けんめい focuses more on wise, prudent judgment.
antonyms: 愚か : おろか : foolish, stupid
antonym_explanation: The most common antonym of the かしこい is おろか. おろか describes lack of wisdom or poor judgment, the opposite of someone who is sensible or clever.

translations.MY: သူက ထက်မြက်တယ်။
ခွေးက ဉာဏ်ကောင်းတယ်။

example_sentences.furigana: 賢(かしこ)い選択(せんたく)をした。

translations.VI: Tôi đã đưa ra một lựa chọn sáng suốt.
translations.MY: ပညာရှိရွေးချယ်မှုတစ်ခုကို လုပ်ခဲ့တယ်။

example_sentences.furigana: 彼女(かのじょ)は賢(かしこ)く判断(はんだん)した。

translations.VI: Cô ấy đã đưa ra một quyết định sáng suốt.
translations.FR: Elle a pris une sage décision.
translations.ZH: 她做了一个明智的决定。
translations.TL: Gumawa siya ng isang matalinong desisyon.
translations.MY: သူမသည် ပညာရှိ ဆုံးဖြတ်ချက်တစ်ခုကို ချလိုက်သည်။
translations.HI: उसने एक बुद्धिमानी भरा निर्णय लिया।

example_sentences.furigana: 子(こ)どもが賢(かしこ)い。

translations.MY: ကလေးက ထက်မြက်တယ်။

example_sentences.furigana: 賢(かしこ)く使(つか)うと便利(べんり)です。

translations.ES: Es útil si se usa sabiamente.
translations.VI: Sẽ hữu ích nếu sử dụng một cách khôn ngoan.
translations.FR: C'est utile si on l'utilise à bon escient.
translations.NE: बुद्धिमानीपूर्वक प्रयोग गरियो भने यो उपयोगी हुन्छ।
translations.BN: বিজ্ঞতার সাথে ব্যবহার করলে এটি কার্যকর।
translations.ZH: 如果使用得当，它会很有用。
translations.TL: Ito ay kapaki-pakinabang kung ginamit nang matalino.
translations.MY: ပညာရှိရှိသုံးရင် အသုံးဝင်ပါတယ်။
translations.HI: यदि इसका उपयोग बुद्धिमानी से किया जाए तो यह उपयोगी है।
translations.AR: إنه مفيد إذا تم استخدامه بحكمة.
translations.FA: اگر عاقلانه استفاده شود، مفید است.

well-behaved (especially children or pet.HI: अच्छा व्यवहार (विशेषकर बच्चों या पालतू जानवरों के प्रति)
well-behaved (especially children or pet.AR: حسن السلوك (خاصة الأطفال أو الحيوانات الأليفة)
well-behaved (especially children or pet.FA: خوش رفتار (به خصوص کودکان یا حیوانات خانگی)
